name: Eat Your Veggies (piotrekfolt)
description:
Game created in 4 days for LOWREZJAM2022

In this game you are a farmer who need to survive against slimes, while taking care of plants, to make sure he has a weapon to fight with (vegetables are your weapons)

Controls:
WASD - Movement
E - Interact (collect seeds, plant veggies, water plants, harvest veggies)
SPACE - Attack

Press SPACE in menu to continue

Everything was created by me except background music.

Background music - Bite Mark Bossa by Martijn de Boer (NiGiD) (c) copyright 2020 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Noncommercial  (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/NiGiD/62145 Ft: Javolenus
